name: Robotics (Malforacic)
description:
A simple platformer with controllable objects.

Made for the "Indie Game Dev Beginners #003" game jam. This is the first game jam I have participated in, and this is also the first game I have ever completed. Enjoy, and let me know what you think!

Controls are explained across the first 5 levels.

I am unable to verify if the WebGL works, so I uploaded a downloadable executable file just in case.
